security.script: SELECT ID ID, USER_NAME USERNAME, REAL_NAME REALNAME, MOBILE MOBILE, EMAIL EMAIL, PASSWORD PASSWORD, STATUS STATUS, DEPARTMENT DEPARTMENT, CREATED_BY CREATEDBY, CREATED_TIME createdTime, UPDATED_BY UPDATEDBY, UPDATED_TIME updatedTime FROM T_RBAC_USERS WHERE is_delete = '00' and USER_NAME = ?

SELECT DISTINCT D.ID ID, D.PERMISSION_CODE PERMISSIONCODE, D.PERMISSION_NAME PERMISSIONNAME FROM T_RBAC_USERS A, T_RBAC_USER_ROLE B, T_RBAC_ROLE_PERMISSION C, T_RBAC_PERMISSIONS D WHERE A.is_delete = '00' AND B.is_delete = '00' AND C.is_delete = '00' AND A.ID = B.USER_ID AND B.ROLE_ID = C.ROLE_ID AND C.PERMISSION_ID = D.ID AND A.USER_NAME = ?

SELECT DISTINCT D.ID ID, D.TEXT TEXT, D.ICON_CLS ICONCLS, D.URL URL, D.PARENT_ID PARENTID, D.DISPLAY DISPLAY FROM T_RBAC_USERS A, T_RBAC_USER_ROLE B, T_RBAC_ROLE_MENU C, T_RBAC_MENUS D WHERE A.is_delete = '00' AND B.is_delete = '00' AND C.is_delete = '00' AND D.is_delete = '00' AND A.ID = B.USER_ID AND B.ROLE_ID = C.ROLE_ID AND C.MENU_ID = D.ID AND D.PARENT_ID = 'ROOT' AND A.USER_NAME = ? ORDER BY D.DISPLAY ASC

SELECT DISTINCT D.ID ID, D.TEXT TEXT, D.ICON_CLS ICONCLS, D.URL URL, D.PARENT_ID PARENTID, D.DISPLAY DISPLAY FROM T_RBAC_USERS A, T_RBAC_USER_ROLE B, T_RBAC_ROLE_MENU C, T_RBAC_MENUS D WHERE A.is_delete = '00' AND B.is_delete = '00' AND C.is_delete = '00' AND D.is_delete = '00' AND A.ID = B.USER_ID AND B.ROLE_ID = C.ROLE_ID AND C.MENU_ID = D.ID AND D.PARENT_ID = ? AND A.USER_NAME = ? ORDER BY D.DISPLAY ASC
